dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of handwritten digits between 0 and 9, with a training set of 60,000 and 10,000 test grayscale images (28 Ã— 28 pixels).
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Johannes Stallkamp
Marc Schlipsing
Jan Salmen
Christian Igel
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 39,209 training and 12,630 test color images from 43 traffic signs taken under various real-world conditions including motion blur, illumination changes, and extremely low resolution.
dcterms:title: GTSRB (German Traffic Sign Recognition Benchmark)

dcterms:description: A non-public dataset of official identity documents, consisting of 1,000 training and 500 testing color images collected under in-the-wild conditions, with considerable variations in resolution and background.
dcterms:title: IDocDB
